reviews.review_msg: For work ethics, I recommend this  course. It can give you a good protfolio to start your carreer. Creativity, lean approach, this is what the employers are looking for at the present time. It takes you away from dry theorical courses and David is a good reference to have.

This was one of the most (if not THE most) useful courses I've taken at SFU. David's lectures are informative yet entertaining, the group project taught me things that I can take with me to any place of employment, and he gave awesome feedback. Whether you're in publishing or not, I would recommend this course to anyone!

Incredibly interesting professor, able to convey complex material clearly and assigns projects which are often useful in your portfolio. He is one of the few professors able to blend high-minded theory with practical output projects. He rules, hard.
You cant ask for a better prof!
